info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:17PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL LEA AND WESTERN GAINES COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM CDT/800 PM MDT/... At 817 PM CDT/717 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Humble City, or near Hobbs, moving southeast at 20 mph, with additional storms near Nadine and Denver City. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Monument, Nadine, Humble City, Knowles, Lea County Regional Airport, Industrial Airpark, Oil Center, Paynes Corner, and Higginbotham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
